name: part_001
file: tmp_【3D SHOWCASE】 I WILL NOW SHOW YOU MY BODY. 3Dお披露目 #Mori3D [maby2NKg7wI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Mori Calliope introduces her new 3D environment and interacts with the audience before the first song.
Mori Calliope performs the song 'Wanted, Wasted'.
MC section between songs, Mori thanks the audience and introduces the next track.
Mori Calliope begins performing the song 'NEZUMI Scheme'.

subtitles.original: Wow! すごいな！ Check out the big speakers too.
subtitles.english: Wow! It's amazing! Check out the big speakers too.

subtitles.original: Yo, that's actually dope. Thanks, glad you think so.
subtitles.english: Yo, that's actually dope. Thanks, glad you think so.

subtitles.original: That's me! Correct, that is you.
subtitles.english: That's me! Correct, that is you.

subtitles.original: And you, and you, and you, and you, and you, and you, and you.
subtitles.english: And you, and you, and you, and you, and you, and you, and you.

subtitles.original: And you, and you. That's kind of hot, not gonna lie.
subtitles.english: And you, and you. That's kind of hot, not gonna lie.

subtitles.original: Correct, correct. It's a little hot in here, but we're about to make it hotter.
subtitles.english: Correct, correct. It's a little hot in here, but we're about to make it hotter.

subtitles.original: Because, guess what you guys, this, this before your eyes...
subtitles.english: Because, guess what you guys, this, this before your eyes...

subtitles.original: ...is not just a regular place to chill. No, no, no, no, no.
subtitles.english: ...is not just a regular place to chill. No, no, no, no, no.

subtitles.original: We have performances. Performances, action, romance...
subtitles.english: We have performances. Performances, action, romance...

subtitles.original: ...maybe not romance, but lots of, lots of performances. So get ready.
subtitles.english: ...maybe not romance, but lots of, lots of performances. So get ready.

subtitles.original: And thank you for the many congratulations, you guys. All right.
subtitles.english: And thank you for the many congratulations, you guys. All right.

subtitles.original: Now, now, for the first performance I want to do...
subtitles.english: Now, now, for the first performance I want to do...

subtitles.original: ...I have something special to show you.
subtitles.english: ...I have something special to show you.

subtitles.original: Check it out. Oh, it's over here.
subtitles.english: Check it out. Oh, it's over here.

subtitles.original: I gotta go grab... I gotta go grab it really quick. Hold on.
subtitles.english: I gotta go grab... I gotta go grab it really quick. Hold on.

subtitles.original: I'm getting it. It's now in my hand. Okay.
subtitles.english: I'm getting it. It's now in my hand. Okay.

subtitles.original: Just so you know, it's... it's in my hands now. Staff-san, staff-san, it's here.
subtitles.english: Just so you know, it's... it's in my hands now. Staff-san, staff-san, it's here.

subtitles.original: The first song that we're singing today is Wanted, Wasted.
subtitles.english: The first song that we're singing today is Wanted, Wasted.

subtitles.original: Let's go.
subtitles.english: Let's go.

subtitles.original: Wanted, Wasted
subtitles.english: Wanted, Wasted

subtitles.original: Whoa-oh-oh-oh-oh...
subtitles.english: Whoa-oh-oh-oh-oh...

subtitles.original: Lyrics by Takuya Yamanaka (THE ORAL CIGARETTES) / Yuki Tsujimura / Mori Calliope
subtitles.english: Lyrics by Takuya Yamanaka (THE ORAL CIGARETTES) / Yuki Tsujimura / Mori Calliope

subtitles.original: Guess who's the reaper, turn it back around, going looking deep inside for the truth to exploit.
subtitles.english: Guess who's the reaper, turn it back around, going looking deep inside for the truth to exploit.

subtitles.original: You know I smoke 'em, I smoke 'em, I smoke 'em, I dye 'em, I smoke 'em, drive me crazy, ah!
subtitles.english: You know I smoke 'em, I smoke 'em, I smoke 'em, I dye 'em, I smoke 'em, drive me crazy, ah!

subtitles.original: Wanted, Wasted, start looking twice, can't, can't stop falling down.
subtitles.english: Wanted, Wasted, start looking twice, can't, can't stop falling down.

subtitles.original: Tell me how mortals show you where the dirt is. One man's trash is another man's purpose.
subtitles.english: Tell me how mortals show you where the dirt is. One man's trash is another man's purpose.

subtitles.original: Stay won't fly high, come tomorrow, fucking die. Stop trash, choking, why? Nothing I own's true mine.
subtitles.english: Stay won't fly high, come tomorrow, fucking die. Stop trash, choking, why? Nothing I own's true mine.

subtitles.original: I started... 愛の無い夢を見てるのは何故? Whoa-oh-oh...
subtitles.english: I started... why am I having a dream without love? Whoa-oh-oh...

subtitles.original: When I wanna be loved but I can't be seen.
subtitles.english: When I wanna be loved but I can't be seen.

subtitles.original: 変えたい現実も、泣き叫ぶ訳も、響き渡る...
subtitles.english: Both the reality I want to change and the reason for crying out, they echo out...

subtitles.original: やっちゃって、やっちゃって、やっちゃって、そのままずっと狂い咲いちゃって...
subtitles.english: Do it, do it, do it, just like that, bloom madly forever...

subtitles.original: 聴いて売るギル、バッド・エンディング、縁から目出す悩み...
subtitles.english: Hear and sell guilt, bad ending, worries emerging from the edge...

subtitles.original: 終わそう、そうあそ、そう、とっくに仕上げて頂戴。整合性、正々堂々、正義の名のもと...
subtitles.english: Finish it, yeah, finish it already. Consistency, fair and square, in the name of justice...

subtitles.original: 下してやるも、ゲーム・メーカー、アンダーテイカー、脳天直下、喰らえ！
subtitles.english: I'll strike it down, game maker, undertaker, straight to the brain, take this!

subtitles.original: 鳴らす...
